TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IColumnMapping

summary.span: 將資料來源資料行與 資料行相關聯，並且由 類別實作，這個類別是由 .NET Framework 資料提供者所共同使用。

span.span: Associates a data source column with a column, and is implemented by the class, which is used in common by .NET Framework data providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面可讓繼承的類別來實作的資料行對應的類別，其會將資料來源資料行資料行。The interface enables an inheriting class to implement a Column Mapping class, which associates a data source column with a column. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [DataAdapter DataTable 和 DataColumn 對應](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md)。For more information, see [DataAdapter DataTable and DataColumn Mappings](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-datatable-and-datacolumn-mappings.md). 應用程式不會建立的執行個體介面直接，但建立繼承的類別的執行個體。An application does not create an instance of the interface directly, but creates an instance of a class that inherits . 繼承的類別必須實作所有繼承的成員，並通常會定義要新增提供者特有的功能的其他成員。Classes that inherit must implement all inherited members, and typically define additional members to add provider-specific functionality. 例如，介面會定義屬性。For example, the interface defines the property. 依次類別會繼承這個屬性，而且也會定義方法。In turn, the class inherits this property, and also defines the method. ## Examples 下列範例會建立衍生類別中的執行個體，並將它加入集合。The following example creates an instance of the derived class, , and adds it to a collection. 然後它會告知使用者對應加入至集合，並且會顯示對應的父代。It then tells the user that the mapping was added to the collection and shows the parent for the mapping. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataColumnMapping Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

para.span: 當您繼承自介面，您應該實作下列建構函式：

span.span: When you inherit from the interface, you should implement the following constructors:

description.span: 初始化 ColumnMapping 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the ColumnMapping class.

description.span: 初始化具有指定的來源資料行名稱的來源 ColumnMapping 類別的新執行個體和資料行名稱。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the ColumnMapping class with a source with the specified source column name and column name.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DataSetColumn { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.DataSetColumn : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定在要對應的 中的目的資料行名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the column within the to map to.

value.span: 在要對應的 中的目的資料行名稱。

span.span: The name of the column within the to map to.
The name is not case sensitive.

summary.span: 取得或設定在資料來源中的來源資料行名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the column within the data source to map from.

value.span: 在資料來源中的資料行的區分大小寫名稱。

span.span: The case-sensitive name of the column in the data source.
